Episode.GuestStars: Creagen Dow|Greg Baine|Rick Hoffman|Jonathan Sadowski|Jesse Heiman|David Burke
Episode.Overview: In this Halloween episode Chuck meets a Federal agent just like him: A computer whiz whose brain is important to national security. However, Chuck soon has a personal dilemma arise when he has to decide whether or not to turn the man over to Sarah and Casey or to help him escape his handlers.
